name: Bad MAC Address
description: This playbook addresses a malicious MAC address, illustrating an action step, command, and agent/target.

action--6398eb05-3eb8-43f5-87d3-f24e0749.name: Block MAC address
action--6398eb05-3eb8-43f5-87d3-f24e0749.description: This command blocks a MAC address on a switch.

commands.command: Switch(conf)#mac address-table static 3467.0933.341c vlan X drop

individual--75baba7d-a198-4c5c-805c-af61.name: Network Admin
individual--75baba7d-a198-4c5c-805c-af61.description: The admin who responds to an alert by configuring a switch.
